UI

Class Download

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • UI.Download
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Download
extends java.lang.Thread
    Thread to download a file from the server to a directory on the computer.
    Author:
    Ariel

    • Constructor Detail

      • Download

        public Download(java.lang.String file,
                FTPAccessClient ftpAccessClient,
                java.lang.String path,
                MainController mainController)
        Initializes Download Object.

        The file argument has to be a file which exists on the server. Path has to be a writeable directory for the current user.

        Parameters:
        file - File to download
        ftpAccessClient - A reference to the FTP client
        path - Path where file is saved to
        mainController - Reference to mainController/main window

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Starts the download in a new thread.

        Downloads and saves file to given path. If something goes wrong, method prints an error message on the console textfield.

        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread
